page.title: 12RECTOR OF GRAFFHAM
page.content: He has been here for 12 years.He is always on call & so his privacy is limited as his office is in his house.He has about 4 baptisms, 5 weddings & 10 funerals a year with one-tenth of the population attending church on Sundays.More go at Easter, Harvest & Christmas.He teaches at our school because he thinks it is important to know the children & for them to meet their Rector.Our school is not a church school but we think this is important too.He thinks that the elderly & housebound need the most help.His favourite hymn is "Praise to the Holiest in the Height" & his favourite prayer is St.Richard's of Chichester.Fulnny things often happen, for instance the organist once stopped with another verse to sing. Mr. Grant thinks the church is important as it is the village centre.
